name: damp-smart-drinkware
description: DAMP Smart Drinkware - Secure Development Environment

scripts.install-security: npm install --save-dev @commitlint/cli @commitlint/config-conventional husky lint-staged detect-secrets gitleaks
scripts.env:setup: npm run env:secure && npm run env:generate-keys:dev
scripts.env:help: echo 'üîê Environment Management Commands:' && echo '  env:secure - Secure existing .env files' && echo '  env:generate-keys - Generate secure random keys' && echo '  env:validate - Validate environment setup' && echo '  env:setup - Complete environment setup (secure + generate)'
scripts.security-check: npm run scan-secrets && npm run validate-env
scripts.security:full: npm run env:secure:preview && npm run scan-secrets && npm run env:validate
